title: Capital city
creator_credit: Carl Thomson, Richard Taylor, Antony Barrier and Antony Barrier Productions
brief_description: The City of London covers only one square mile, yet it is the most sophisticated money market in the world. Behind the tradition of the election of the Lord Mayor and the ancient Liveries Companies we are shown how the City of London sets about its complex task of providing a balanced environment for its working people and residents.
creator_credit_for_label: Carl Thomson, Richard Taylor, Antony Barrier and Antony Barrier Productions
